title: Climate change drives flooding risk increases in the Yellow River Basin
content:
Publication date: June 2024

Source: Geography and Sustainability, Volume 5, Issue 2

Author(s): Hengxing Lan, Zheng Zhao, Langping Li, Junhua Li, Bojie Fu, Naiman Tian, Ruixun Lai, Sha Zhou, Yanbo Zhu, Fanyu Zhang, Jianbing Peng, John J. Clague
